value.title: 6 times SC2 Pros FAILED (including the GOAT Serral!) - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: We often think of our StarCraft 2 pros as being gods of skill, but once in a while they prove they're still human and have fails - even players like Serral, Dark, Clem and Zest! They prove they're still one of us one of us one us one of us... -- üê∑ Second Channel for Learning Resources: https://www.youtube.com/c/PiGRandom

value.title: A Genius Strategy to a Dumb Challenge (Mouse ONLY) | Special vs Cham (1-game TvZ) - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: As part of PiG's Laboratory, I challenged pros to play with their mouse only (no keyboards!) to see what a pro StarCraft 2 game looks like with such a ridiculous rule. Here's Special (Terran) facing Cham (Zerg) trying it out! -- üê∑ Second Channel for Learning StarCraft 2: https://www.youtube.com/c/PiGRandom

value.title: StarCraft 2 - How Quickly Can SCARLETT Dispose Of Noobs? (PART 4/4) | Holdout Challenge
value.excerpt: We paid Scarlett to 1v1 noobs. The challenge: the noobs needed to stay in the match as long as possible while Scarlett did her best to cheese the heck out of them. We ended this challenge by putting her up against a GM player! This Holdout Challenge was a part of  PiG Sty Festival 2021.   Holdout Challenge
